metadata.title: CVE-2025-21523 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component:InnoDB).  Supported versions that are affected are 8.0.40 and prior, 8.4.3and prior and  9.1.0 and prior. Easily exploitable vulnerability allowshigh privileged attacker with network access via multiple protocols tocompromise MySQL Server.  Successful attacks of this vulnerability canresult in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatablecrash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 4.9 (Availabilityimpacts).  CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

criterions.comment: mysql-8.0 package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
mariadb package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
